subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: My box is shipping tomorrow!
author: Lisby
full_text:
Oh don't worry, I will. I'm not sure I ever ever been as excited in  
my life as I am about this.

Thank you, Mike, for the info.

I listened to your shows, too, and liked them very much.

Ann

On Dec 15, 2007, at 8:27 AM, M.A. Coletta (Mike) wrote:

> Hi Ann,
>
> I'm happy for your happy news! Looks like more and more people are
> taking possession of the many different boxes now available. I look
> forward to reading about your adventures with your new Mini Box.
> Looking at their website, it appears the box already might have the
> jack you're asking about. The box has three connectors on the front,
> (Mic, Recorder, and Speaker) Looks like the output is already tapped
> off in two places, one for the speaker and one for the recorder. I'm
> guessing the mic jack is so you can interface for a session, etc.
>
> Let us know how your works...
>
> - Mike
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
> >
> > Is the speaker all I need or any kind of jack? For it?
> >
> > Steve, will also ask Lisa if she's aware of the "technician" who
> will
> > hopefully be assisting me? I just want to get confirmation or
> > rejection of what I seem to be sensing.
> >
> > Thanks!
> >
> > Ann
> >
> > On Dec 13, 2007, at 10:10 PM, Steve Hultay wrote:
> >
> > > Ann,
> > >
> > > I went to radio shack and bought a speaker model #21-549 and it
> seems
> > > to work fine. I got mine yesterday and didn't seem to thrilled
> about
> > > the results and gave another try tonight. Tonight, i spoke to
> several
> > > different people in their own voices and really have to give
> credit to
> > > Mike and Lisa for making this communication keep getting better.
> This
> > > really is another valuable box in my research, as long as
> different
> > > designs become available i will test them all. Every box is unique
> > > and offers different results, but they all work off the same
> premise
> > > of raw audio bits. Real time communication is finally here and
> gets
> > > better every day, some day's frank's box is better and than some
> day's
> > > RS box...etc. Depends on your surroundings, your mood, the weather
> > > but all these devices have worked for me up to this point and i'm
> > > grateful.
> > >
> > > p.s.--here is the link to the speaker so you can get a visual.
> > >
> > > http://www.radioshack.com/search/index.jsp?kwCatId=&kw=21-
> > > 549&origkw=21-549&sr=1
> > >
> > > Your going to love this wild ride and watching new people get
> involved
> > > and posted results makes it all worth it for me.
> > >
> > > -Steve H.
> > >
> > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@> wrote:
> > > >
> > > > I just got my notice. I think I may faint from excitement.
> > > >
> > > > Hey, fellow list dwellers who have one--what extra equipment to
> I
> > > > need to have to make this function (speakers, but not computer
> > > > speakers)? Anything else I can go out an get now? I am truly,
> truly
> > > > technology challenged, so guidance addressed to one like a
> toddler
> > > is
> > > > what I need.
> > > >
> > > > Ann
> > > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> >
>
>
>
